legal_citations: Supply of Goods and Services Act 1982

content.title: FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT
content.purpose: Sets out general terms for future orders/call-offs. No commitment to minimum volume.
key_sections: 1. SCOPE: This Agreement governs all Orders placed by Customer with Supplier for [PRODUCTS/SERVICES].
2. ORDERS: Customer may issue Orders (POs). Supplier accepts/rejects within [DAYS] days. Each Order forms a separate contract incorporating these terms.
3. NO MINIMUM: No obligation to place Orders or minimum volume.
4. PRICING: Prices in Schedule 1 or as quoted. Fixed for [PERIOD] then reviewable on [NOTICE] notice. Price increases: Customer may terminate affected Orders.
5. DELIVERY: Per Order. Time not of essence unless stated. Delivery to [LOCATION]. Risk passes on delivery. Title passes on payment.
6. QUALITY: Goods fit for purpose, as described, of satisfactory quality. Services with reasonable skill and care. Warranty: [PERIOD].
8. LIABILITY: Limited to [greater of Order value or Â£X]. No consequential loss. No limit for death/injury or fraud.
10. TERM: [YEARS] from date. Either party may terminate on [NOTICE] notice. Termination does not affect existing Orders.
11. AUDIT: Customer may audit compliance [annually] on [NOTICE] notice.
12. MODERN SLAVERY: Supplier complies with Modern Slavery Act 2015. Annual statement if required.
13. ANTI-BRIBERY: Parties comply with Bribery Act 2010. Zero tolerance.
